itunes:title: Episode 794​​​ - Special Guest US Navy SEAL Sean Matson
title: Episode 794​​​ - Special Guest US Navy SEAL Sean Matson
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Cardomax founder and former Navy SEAL Sean Matson to talk about his attempt to break the world record for fastest run mile while wearing a bomb suit, the part he played in helping rename the Washington Redski...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Cardomax founder and former Navy SEAL Sean Matson to talk about his attempt to break the world record for fastest run mile while wearing a bomb suit, the part he played in helping rename the Washington Redskins, what he thinks about DC becoming a state, and how he manages to stay in ridiculous shape even after leaving the military. 

 

Go to CardoMAX.com and use promo code DB, and you get Buy One Get One FREE on your first order.
